name: livets-workspace
description: LiveTS - Real-time server-rendered web applications with TypeScript and Rust

scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:core && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run dev:example
scripts.lint: npm run lint:rust && npm run lint:ts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:rust && npm run clean:ts
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm run publish:packages
scripts.publish:packages: cd packages/rust-core && npm publish --access public && cd ../core && npm publish --access public && cd ../client && npm publish --access public
